metadata.title: Friday, 8th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)whether the Government has ever carried out a livestock restocking exercise in Lukulu West Parliamentary Constituency and, if so, when; and
(b)if a livestock restocking exercise has never been carried out, what the reasons are.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth and Sport when the Government will construct recreation facilities in Kapiri-Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)why Sesheke District Council has been allocating unserviced plots to developers;
(b)when such plots will be serviced; and

(c)whether the Council has any plans of servicing the plots before allocating them to developers.
